system.description:
You dance upon the footsteps of the dragons, and your strikes become stronger. Spend 1 Beat to take on the Naga Maw Stance until you suffer Hits. While in this stance, when you Inflict Violence, you inflict +1 Hit.

Flaming Naga Style: Spend 2 Beats. All your attacks while in this stance also set aflame.

Dancing Dragon Style: Spend 3 Beats. You may now Rush before taking the stance. While in this stance, inflict 1 Hit on 1 adjacent enemy whenever you end your riff while in this stance.
system.flavor: A stance taken upon by ancient warrior-king Panglima Yulido when challenged to a deadly duel by the monkey god Laksamana, whom he defeated. Described as a naga about to bite into a prey that its caught.
